attributes.title: Associate Yourself More And More With The Cosmos Face Of You!
attributes.description:
1 AUGUST 2020

*PARAMASHIVA’S DIRECT MESSAGE FROM KAILASA:

*IT IS TIME NOW FOR ALL BEINGS NATURALLY TO ASSOCIATE, AFFIRM, OUR ONENESS, EXISTENCE WITH UNIVERSE, COSMOS.

*IT IS TIME FOR ALL OF US TO AFFIRM, TO BE BOLD, STRONGLY DECLARING, STRONGLY CENTERING YOURSELF AS COSMOS, UNIVERSE.

*WE ALL CONTINUOUSLY CONNECT WITH OUR BODY DIMENSION. THAT IS WHY SUCH IMMEDIATE RESPONSE WE GIVE TO OUR CHEMICAL AND HORMONAL ACTIONS AND REACTIONS HAPPENING IN OUR SYSTEM.

*I AM NOT SAYING WE ARE NOT BODY. I AM SAYING BODY IS ONLY ONE OF OUR DIMENSION. YOU HAVE MANY MORE PHASES AND FACES.

*COSMOS, THIS WHOLE PRAPANJA IS ALSO ONE OF YOUR FACE/PHASE, DIMENSION.

*BECAUSE THE COSMOS, ITS EXPANSION IS ACCELERATED, IF YOU ASSOCIATE YOURSELF MORE AND MORE WITH THE COSMOS FACE OF YOU, NOW YOU WILL GET THE IMPACT OF THAT ACCELERATED EXPANSION.

*ACCELERATED EXPANSION IN THE COSMOS CAN INTENSELY LAND IN YOU AND MANIFEST.

*IF YOU REMEMBER YOU ARE BODY MORE AND MORE, YOU WILL BE WORKING ON YOUR CHEMICAL AND HORMONAL REACTIONS - FOOD AND SEX.

* WHEN THE BODY CHEMISTRY ATTACKS YOU, THE STRONGEST THING IT TRIGGERS IS “NOT FEELING SATISFIED”, SO IMMEDIATELY YOU DUMP FOOD.

* 90% OF YOUR HUNGER SIGNALS ARE FALSE SIGNALS. IT IS ACTUALLY BECAUSE OF YOUR FRUSTRATION AND IRRITATION. IT IS LIKE A WRONG PAYMENT. IT IS LIKE SOMEONE CAME FOR WATER, BUT YOU GIVE THEM YOUR DIAMOND AND GOLD. INSTEAD, JUST UNCLUTCH.

* IF YOU DUMP FOOD, YOU WILL WASTE THE FOOD AND THE BODY. AT LEAST FOOD YOU CAN GET BACK BUT BODY WILL BE DESTROYED.

*YOUR HORMONE IS TELLING YOU: “YOU ARE FEELING LONELY.” IT DOESN'T MEAN YOU SHOULD START SOME SEXUAL ACTIVITY LIKE PORNO.

*WHEN YOUR BODY TELLS YOU YOU ARE LONELY, YOU NEED LITTLE UNCLUTCHING.

*YOU HAVE 25 FACES LIKE PARAMASHIVA. YOU ARE BODY IS ONE PHASE.

* SPEND MORE TIME TILL DECEMBER 14TH IN SUCH SPIRITUAL THINGS. SO MUCH ACCELERATED EXPANSION IS HAPPENING.

*I AM TRYING TO MAP SANSKRIT INTO MODERN DAY ENGLISH. WHETHER COMPUTING OR TRANSLATING OR IF YOU DEVELOP CERTAIN CAPABILITIES, SANSKRIT IS THE BEST.

*IF YOU CAN ADD SANSKRIT WORDS IN YOUR THINKING, IT IS LIKE ADDING DETOX IN YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS.

*I AM HERE TO GIVE YOU ENLIGHTENMENT. I DON'T BELONG TO THIS OR THAT LANGUAGE. I BELONG TO COSMOS. SASKRIT IS DEVA BHASHA.

*MY BRAIN FUNDAMENTALLY FUNCTIONS IN SANSKRIT. I TALK IN SANSKRIT BASED TAMIL. IT WAS THERE BUT DESTROYED BY THE DRAVISH GANG.

*I AM NOT EVEN SAYING BECOME A SANSKRIT SCHOLAR OVERNIGHT. IF SOMEONE SMOKES 1 OR 2 CIGARETTES A DAY, IF I TELL HIM TO DROP CIGARETTES.,HE MIGHT DROP. IF HE SMOKES 2 PACKETS A DAY, IF I TELL HIM TO DROP CIGARETTE, HE WILL DROP ME!

*MAYBE ONE UPANISHAD YOU CAN READ IN ONE WEEK. READ ORIGINAL VERSE IN SANSKRIT AND I AM PROMOTING SANSKRIT THINKING BECAUSE THE LANGUAGE IN WHICH YOU THINK EXPANDS YOUR ABILITY TO HOLD POWERFUL COGNITIONS.

*THE LANGUAGE IN WHICH YOU THINK HELPS YOU IN HOLDING, MANIFESTING POWERFUL COGNITIONS. SO THE LANGUAGE IN WHICH YOU THINKS PLAYS A MAJOR ROLE IN YOUR ENLIGHTENMENT.

*IF YOU START THINKING IN SANSKRIT YOU BECOMING A PARAMASHIVA GANA WILL BE TOO EASY.

*SANSKRIT WILL BE THE COGNITION LANGUAGE OF KAILASA.

*THIS IS ONE OF THE MAHAVAKYA I RECEIVED FROM ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL. THIS IS FROM THE RAMANA SAMPRADAYA:

*DEHAM NAHAM BOGAM SOHAM!
LIKE HOW YOU LEARN IN SCHOOL: BAA BAA BLACK SHEEP. THE RHYMES YOU LEARNT WILL PLAY A MAJOR ROLE IN YOUR LIFE. THIS IS ACTUALLY IN THOSE TASKS...

DEHAM -BODY
NAA HAM - AM NOT
KOHAM-WHO AM I
SOHAM-PARAMASHIVA

I CAN BUILD A FULL TEMPLE FOR ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL FOR PUTTING THIS ONE VERSE INTO MY HEAD. EVEN WHEN RUNNING TO THE RESTROOM I WILL SING THIS ONLY!

*WORDS YOU CHERISH IN YOU FOR SIX MONTHS WILL BECOME REALITY IN A YEAR. IT WILL BECOME AN ECHOCHAMBER FOR YOU.

*IF YOU LIVE KASHI, KANCHI, TIRUVANNAMALAI, AYODHYA ALL THESE PLACES EVEN IF YOU JUST LIVE YOU CANNOT PROTECT YOURSELF FROM ENLIGHTENMENT! THAT IS WHY THEY ARE CALLED MOKSHA PURIS. IN KASHI EVEN IF YOU FALL IN THE ROAD YOU WILL FALL IN SOME TIEMPLE!

*YOU CAN'T WALK IN TIRUVANNAMALAI, AYODHYA, MADURA, TIRUVANNAMALAI - MOKSHA PURIS

READ MORE AT: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4174818342605984
